snippet: Virginia Coach Mike London announced Sunday that he had fired four assistants and reassigned another as part of sweeping changes to his staff after the Cavaliers finished 4-8 this season.
lead_paragraph: Virginia Coach Mike London announced Sunday that he had fired four assistants and reassigned another as part of sweeping changes to his staff after the Cavaliers finished 4-8 this season.

headline.seo: Virginia Begins Overhaul of Football Program
headline.main: Virginia Begins Overhaul of Football Program
